text:
Hi Team,
I need to grant the *`automation.sequences.read`* permission to a user with a *Sales Professional seat*. However, I can't find anything under *Automation*, and the only "Sequences" option available in *Access Manager* is under *Sales,* which doesn't do the trick.
Could you please advise on how to proceed?

P.S. there is no info on that scope in here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/apps/authentication/working-with-oauth#scopes> (Maybe because its beta?)
